meanings.definition: A device used to remove magnetism from an object.
meanings.sent1: The demagnetizers in the workshop helped fix the broken tools.
meanings.sent2: The technician used demagnetizers to fix the magnetized equipment.
meanings.sent3: The demagnetizers had a party, making all the magnets dizzy!
meanings.sent4: The demagnetizers worked like magic, erasing all traces of magnetism.
meanings.sent5: The demagnetizers hummed softly as they neutralized the magnetic field.
